File.Title: Will RTS,S be made available as part of a tiered pricing structure?
File.HtmlText: RTS,S is currently being developed solely for use in sub-Saharan Africa since burden of malaria caused by P. falciparum is mostly occurring in sub-Saharan African children under 5 years of age. Tiered pricing (where prices are aligned to a country’s ability to pay) is not applicable because this vaccine will not be made available in higher income countries.
